title: Design
description: Interested in Japanese minimalism, tea room architecture or kawaii culture? Our team of designers guide you through Japan’s unique architecture and design and how it affects Japan’s life and scenery today.
meta_title: Hotel Design in Tokyo, Japan | Hotel Zen Tokyo Blog
meta_description: Interested in Japanese minimalism, tea room architecture or kawaii culture? Learn about Japan’s unique architecture and design and how it affects Japan today.
